mapper.select: SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(blog blog_pno_pk) */ pno, title, regexp_substr(content,'[^('||chr(13)||chr(10)||')]+',1,1) "content", writer, regDate FROM blog WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog (pno, title, content, writer) VALUES (seq_blog.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE blog SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updateDate = sysdate WHERE pno = #{pno}
